document.full_text: a pittsburgh woman will be doing a perp walk, not a walk down the aisle, after being sentenced to more than five years in prison on friday for running a fake bridal show in boston.
document.title: woman sentenced in boston wedding show scam
lines_and_colors: a pittsburgh woman will be doing a perp walk, not a walk down the aisle, after being sentenced to more than five years in prison on friday for running a fake bridal show in boston.
